ModMetaData.name: New Zone Tools (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Britnoth
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of NewZoneTools mod https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=17094.0
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/NewZoneTools][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] Uniform grow tool: Selects a grow zone in an area matching the fertility of the initially selected tile. Also available in [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1339135272]TD Enhancement Pack[/url]
Chequer cancel tool: Cancel construction or blueprints in a chessboard like pattern.
[strike]Replace wall tool: Place new wall blueprints over existing walls.[/strike] Use [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1372003680]Replace Stuff[/url] instead
[strike]Cut blighted: A tool to select only plants with blight to be cut.[/strike] Use [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=761421485]Allow Tool[/url] instead
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
